channel.title: PLEASE HELP! easyrsc webserver signed but cant access rscd files thru the applet
channel.description: hey so i got my version of easyrsc to compile and run with the runclient.bat however i have a issue when trying to run the client in a browser. the rscd files are not found in the java console. im thinking that i want the cache files to be in a folder on my website or in the jar file itself.. how can i get the rscd files to load? (get past loading configuration in the client)
